name: Fly Sarge Fly
description:
After suffering from a heart attack, Sarge finds himself in an dark and unknown place. With his small weak wings, he needs to find a way out of the darkness, while confronting his past. Controls: Left - A, Left Arrow Right - D, Right Arrow Jump - W, Space, Up Arrow For Linux users, the game can be run with Wine without any problems.
